column4: huh? afeter upgrading breezy to feisty Xorg.0.log says "failed to load module "i810" (module doesn't exist,0)
tho under Breezy it did work
did you first upgrade to edgy?
you probably miss a whole lot of stuff. better to re-install faisty.
kinda difficult: I have no cd player
how about re-installing ubuntu-desktop? see if you get more packages to install.
otherwise I think the package name is xserver-xorg-video-i810
can't use it; X doens't work

ok. I'm trying to help but I can't say I'm too optimistic about it since I don't think your upgrade went well at all. you probably need to load the module for it. to see which driver you need to modprobe see here: http://kmuto.jp/debian/hcl/
I would try to borrow an external cd drive and install feisty from scratch...
lke I thought - i need eepro100 or ee100; eepro100 is inserted en listed in lsmod
